author: BBC News
title: Burkina Faso gold mine blast kills 60
description: Dozens more are injured in Burkina Faso after sticks of dynamite in a market blew up, officials say.
content:
Image caption, A local resident describes the scenes of wreckage as horrific, according to the AFP news agency
